div.div: Welcome to the Elk Mound Area School District Opening Minds for Life’s Journey
Helping our youth become responsible citizens who seek to contribute to our society in positive ways
Helping our youth become responsible citizens who seek to contribute to our society in positive ways

a.title: Slide Number 1 - HOME of the Mounders

li.a: Slide Number 1 - HOME of the Mounders

img.alt: Slide Number 1 - HOME of the Mounders

div.p: Welcome to the Elk Mound District web page. We are pleased that you have taken the time to explore the information that is found on this site. The school district has a proud tradition of excellence in educating our youth. We are proud of both our academic and extra-curricular successes.

p.span: Video of #BeTheLightWI in Elk Mound last night! #mounderpride
Congratulations to Bailey Gilbertson for a FFA Bronze Proficiency Award for Dairy Production Entrepreneurship Proficiency and Kendall Nigon Sectional Winner and State Finalist in Forest Management...
Elk Mound supporting our Seniors and student-athletes! #mounderpride #BeTheLightWI
Good Afternoon Mounders, Yesterday, Governor Evers extended the current order and we will not physically be returning to school. Our plan is to continue with home-based learning. There are many...

Update, iBoss has reported that the problem has been resolved. Users, including staff and students, many need to sign out of their Chromebooks and sign back in to ensure the changes/updates have been...
Hello Everyone, Our content filtering company iBoss push out an update yesterday that is causing issues with many of the services that students and teachers are using. This issue is affecting all...
8th grade science students shared their animal/plant adaptations projects virtually with Ms. Stoiber’s class. #mounderpride #EMMS
Friday night at 8pm the HS football/track lights and Legion Park lights will be turned on to support the 2020 seniors and spring athletes for the “Be the Light” campaign! #mounderpride
A neat picture from a student for our bus drivers delivering meals! Thank you students for posting the pictures on your doors and windows. Our drivers enjoy seeing this. A reminder we will deliver...

We want to thank our community for taking part in the referendum process by voting. It was a wonderful turn out of community members making their voices heard and the referendum passed. We thank the...

Reminder of Meal Delivery/Pick Up week of April 14-17: Meals will be delivered on Tuesday and Thursday this week with pick up available on Tuesday and Thursday from 7:30 a.m. - 10:30 a.m. at the HS....
Mounders.....here is the correct link for the Senior 2020 yard signs..... #MounderPride #SeniorStrong #ClassOf2020

Mounders..... Order a Senior Strong Class of 2020 yard sign. They are $7.25 each. If you would like to pre-order one, click on the link and provide your name, quantity, phone number and email address....
Ms. Stoiber’s home room did a Google Hangout today to sing Happy Birthday to Jace. #mounderpride #EMMS
Thank you students for the pictures and messages shared with our bus drivers during delivery of meals. The bus drivers appreciate seeing your artwork and recieving your messages. #mounderpride
